seo.title: About me
seo.description: Want to know more about Florian Lefebvre? Find out how he became a web developer, what technologies he uses, his education & more!

hero.title: **About** me
content: I have always been passionate about IT. In middle school, I was already managing computers and fixing problems with a friend. So no one was surprised when I turned to programming at 13.

Programming was obviously not taught, but I managed to learn on my own, watching [tutorials on YouTube](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=Wm6CUkswsNw), reading blog posts, and [copying and pasting](https://stackoverflow.com/questions/114543/how-can-i-horizontally-center-an-element) bits of code I didn't understand. Classic.

After [coding games](/projects/glutton-runner), I finally turned to web development! From simple HTML and CSS, through Bootstrap and Jekyll to React and Next.js, what a journey! Not linear but exciting...

Besides that, did you know that I was a musician? It's been more than 10 years now, playing drums, percussions and bass guitar in various bands: [orchestra](https://ohf31.fr), [rock band](https://www.instagram.com/legrouperock/)...

skills.title: My **skills**
skills.description: Learning web development as a self-taught person allowed me to discover many, *many* techs... Here are the ones I prefer to work with!

moreSkills.title: And much **more!**
moreSkills.description: My tech stack relies on knowledge of certain programming languages, and I have also worked with other technologies that are worth mentioning.

education.title: **Education** & certifications
education.description: Being a self-taught person doesn't mean I don't have an education. I've always been pretty good at school, see for yourself!

elements.title: High School Diploma
elements.description: Honourable mention. CS and Mathematics. European section (English)
